decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1426/Ex/001, 1426/Ex/002, 1426/Ex/003, 1426/Ex/004, 1426/Ex/005, 1426/Ex/006, 1426/Ex/007, 1426/Ex/008, 1426/Ex/009, 1426/P/120, 1426/P/121, 1426/P/122, 1426/P/123, 1426/P/147, 1426/P/164, 1426/P/165, 1426/P/166, 1426/P/167, Design and Access Statement March 2016, Heritage Statement March 2015. Received: 21/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - Before the development hereby permitted is occupied, arrangements shall be agreed in writing with the local planning authority and be put in place to ensure that, with the exception of disabled persons, no resident of the development shall obtain a resident's parking permit within any controlled parking zone which may be in force in the surrounding area at any time.
description: Conversion of loft space into habitable space to create an additional two flats. Conversion includes six new lead clad dormers to rear roof slope, two front roof windows, internal alterations to the layout and renovation to building fabric
